thread.title: Melrose raises GKN bid to $11.2 bln in final offer

title: Melrose raises GKN bid to $11.2 bln in final offer
text:
Melrose raises GKN bid to $11.2 bln in final offer Monday, March 12, 2018 - 01:17 
Melrose Industries increased its hostile offer for GKN by around 10 percent to 8.1 billion pounds ($11.2 billion), trying to win over investors after the British engineering firm struck a rival deal of its own last week. Sonia Legg reports
